key_title: Key to the subspecies of Wurmbea dioica

Key to the families of Monocotyledons
Key to the families in the Asparagales-Liliales complex

Key to the species of Wurmbea

leads.lead_text: Uppermost leaf ovate, lacking an elongate, filiform apex; flowers pink-edged with age; occurring in drier sites in the north-west of Victoria
Uppermost leaf narrow-linear to subulate or filiform with an elongate apex; flowers not pink-edged; widespread across the state
Plants semi-aquatic; uppermost leaf filiform except for the expanded base; flowers cream with greenish-brown nectary bands and yellow anthers
Plants not aquatic; uppermost leaf lanceolate to subulate, only the apex filiform; flowers usually white with purple nectary bands and anthers
